verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Whom have I in heaven but You
G Gsus F add G
There is nothing on earth I desire beside You
C G/B
My heart and my strength
Am D G
Many times they fail
C G/B
But there is one truth
Am D
That always will prevail //

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
C G/B
God is the strength of my heart
Am D G
God is the strength of my heart
C G/B
God is the strength of my heart
Em Am G/B D
And my portion fore--ver (Repeat)
G Gsus
...Forever
